entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
